name: part_007
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Revival ⧸ 重大告知あり！【#角巻わため生誕祭2024】 [fcFwvfav6mQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Conclusion of the 'Namae no nai Kaibutsu' performance.

subtitles.original: 名前のない怪物
subtitles.english: The Nameless Monster

subtitles.original: 静寂に響けよ My howling
subtitles.english: Echo through the silence, my howling

subtitles.original: Howling
subtitles.english: Howling

subtitles.original: 滔々と流れてく風景
subtitles.english: A landscape that flows on and on

subtitles.original: 刹那的な日々の中で
subtitles.english: Within these fleeting days

subtitles.original: 差し伸べられた手は優しく
subtitles.english: The hand reached out to me was kind

subtitles.original: 鼓動に滴る微熱の予感
subtitles.english: A premonition of a slight fever dripping into my heartbeat

subtitles.original: 風に逆らう そう生きてきたから
subtitles.english: Fighting against the wind, because that's how I've lived

subtitles.original: 君に会って気づく
subtitles.english: Meeting you, I realize

subtitles.original: もう一人じゃない
subtitles.english: I'm not alone anymore

subtitles.original: 咆哮 瞬きは 咆哮 月へ響く
subtitles.english: A howl, a flicker, a howl echoes to the moon

subtitles.original: 爪弾く未知 艱難の群れ 共に嘆く夜
subtitles.english: A strummed unknown, a host of hardships, a night we grieve together

subtitles.original: 遠く伝播する想いは心強くする
subtitles.english: Sentiments propagating far and wide make me stronger

subtitles.original: 付け入るなよ 後ろに君がいるから
subtitles.english: Don't you dare try anything, because you're behind me

subtitles.original: 私は迷わない 光射す道へ
subtitles.english: I won't hesitate on the path toward the light

subtitles.original: 無力だから仲間を求め
subtitles.english: Because I'm powerless, I seek companions

subtitles.original: 凍えるから火を灯して
subtitles.english: Because I'm freezing, I light a fire

subtitles.original: 変化と共に進化してく
subtitles.english: Evolving along with the changes

subtitles.original: この結末は誰も知らない
subtitles.english: No one knows how this ends

subtitles.original: 君を信じる そう決めているから
subtitles.english: I believe in you, because that's what I've decided

subtitles.original: どんな異常 非情も
subtitles.english: Any anomaly, any heartlessness

subtitles.original: 乗り越えられるよ
subtitles.english: I can overcome them all

subtitles.original: 月光 今宵に唯一 凛と咲く花
subtitles.english: Moonlight, the only flower blooming gallantly tonight

subtitles.original: 恐れなのか憧れなのか 向かい合う夜空
subtitles.english: Is it fear, or is it longing? Facing the night sky

subtitles.original: 大地を駆け抜ける 私と君が作り出す
subtitles.english: Dashing across the earth, you and I create

subtitles.original: この物語 多重な未来じゃない
subtitles.english: This story, it's not some multiple future

subtitles.original: 沸き立つ情熱 この声に乗せよう
subtitles.english: Let's put our surging passion into this voice

subtitles.original: 空を飛ぶ羽根なくても
subtitles.english: Even without wings to fly through the sky

subtitles.original: 手を繋げられたから
subtitles.english: Because we were able to hold hands

subtitles.original: この運命を選んだ
subtitles.english: I chose this fate

subtitles.original: 連動する遠吠えは静寂に響いて
subtitles.english: Our linked howls echo through the silence

subtitles.original: 何度も何度も その絆を確かめあった
subtitles.english: Time and time again, we confirmed that bond

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 瞬きは 咆哮 月へ響く
subtitles.english: Ah, a flicker, a howl echoes to the moon

subtitles.original: 爪弾く未知 艱難の群れ 共に嘆く夜
subtitles.english: A strummed unknown, a host of hardships, a night we grieve together

subtitles.original: 遠く伝播する想いは心強くする
subtitles.english: Sentiments propagating far and wide make me stronger

subtitles.original: 共に行こうよ 傍に君がいるから
subtitles.english: Let's go together, because you're by my side

subtitles.original: 私は迷わない 光射す道へ
subtitles.english: I won't hesitate on the path toward the light

subtitles.original: Listen to my howling
subtitles.english: Listen to my howling

subtitles.original: 狼が止まることはない
subtitles.english: The wolf will never stop

subtitles.original: PSYCHO
subtitles.english: PSYCHO

subtitles.original: Hey, unhappy? 弱腰 楽園
subtitles.english: Hey, unhappy? Spineless paradise

subtitles.original: into this order 吸い込まれていく
subtitles.english: Sucked into this order

subtitles.original: 地球もそろそろ 縄張り疲れ
subtitles.english: The Earth is getting tired of territory wars too

subtitles.original: 飽きちゃったね いつまで転がろう
subtitles.english: Bored of it all, how long shall we keep rolling?

subtitles.original: 輪廻転生 繰り返される営み
subtitles.english: Samsara, the recurring cycle of life

subtitles.original: つまんない 正すと更生
subtitles.english: Boring, if you fix it, it's rehabilitation

subtitles.original: 聖母 ごちゃ混ぜ 混沌召し上がれ
subtitles.english: Virgin Mary, all mixed up, feast on the chaos

subtitles.original: 悪意が僕を 魅了して止まない
subtitles.english: Malice fascinates me incessantly
